statements: SELECT * FROM WeatherData
SELECT Temperature, Humidity FROM WeatherData
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE Pressure > 1000
SELECT Date, Temperature FROM WeatherData ORDER BY Temperature DESC
SELECT Date, Pressure FROM WeatherData WHERE Humidity < 0.5 ORDER BY Date DESC
SELECT Date, Temperature, Humidity, Pressure FROM WeatherData;
SELECT Temperature, Humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE Pressure > 1000;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE Temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT Date, Pressure FROM WeatherData WHERE Humidity < 60 ORDER BY Date DESC;
SELECT AVG(Temperature) AS AvgTemp, MAX(Humidity) AS MaxHumidity FROM WeatherData;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 30 ORDER BY temperature ASC
SELECT id, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE wind_speed > 10
SELECT * FROM weather_predictions WHERE predicted_temperature < 20 ORDER BY predicted_temperature
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 70 ORDER BY humidity ASC;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT id, date, predicted_temperature, predicted_humidity FROM weather_predictions WHERE predicted_temperature < 20 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT id, date, temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE wind_speed > 15 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT city_name, country FROM city WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT AVG(humidity) FROM weather_data
SELECT city_name, COUNT(*) FROM city GROUP BY city_name
SELECT city_name, country FROM city WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 60 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT city_name, country, temperature FROM city c INNER JOIN weather_data w ON c.city_name = w.city_name WHERE temperature < 20
SELECT city_name, AVG(temperature) as average_temp FROM city c INNER JOIN weather_data w ON c.city_name = w.city_name GROUP BY city_name ORDER BY average_temp DESC
SELECT date, prediction FROM weather_predictions WHERE prediction BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0
SELECT * FROM WeatherData LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT city, country FROM Location WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT forecast_id, predicted_temperature, predicted_humidity FROM WeatherForecast ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT trend_description, start_date, end_date FROM WeatherTrends WHERE trend_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT city, country FROM Location WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT forecast_id, date, predicted_temperature FROM WeatherForecast WHERE predicted_temperature < 20 AND predicted_humidity > 0.8;
SELECT trend_description FROM WeatherTrends WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND humidity < 0.6 ORDER BY temperature ASC;
SELECT * FROM weather_station;
SELECT station_name, location FROM weather_station ORDER BY station_name DESC;
SELECT temperature, date FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT station_name, precipitation FROM weather_station JOIN precipitation_data ON weather_station.station_id = precipitation_data.station_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_trends FROM weather_trends;
SELECT * FROM weather_station ORDER BY station_name ASC, location DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT station_name, location FROM weather_station WHERE location = 'New York' OR location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT data_id, temperature, date FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT station_id, humidity FROM humidity_data WHERE date > '2022-01-01' AND date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM precipitation_data WHERE precipitation BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY data_id DESC LIMIT 5;
